title: Bostitch Personal Electric Pencil Sharpener, Powerful Stall-Free Motor, High Capacity Shavings Tray, Blue (EPS4-BLUE)
description: Designed to be compact, light, and efficient for the typical home or office user. Created with the home and office users in mind, its space-saver feature allows it to fit perfectly in any space and look great with its modern twist. It may be small, but it has a powerful motor you can rely on to operate stall-free. The high capacity, easy clean shavings tray will eliminate your frequent trips to the waste basket. And keeping your safety in mind, the shavings tray has the added benefit of safely preventing operation when the tray is removed. Expect precision and clean sharpening with the HHC Cutter Technology, which extends cutter life by 4x*. All completely built for personal convenience. 7 year warranty
